TopicTitle: How did I become a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer?

Articles.Content: I just now noticed that I'm listed as such, and wasn't sure how it happened. Seems I have seen other people with that forum rank who have widely varying numbers of posts, so seems not connected to number of posts.

Magic 'n' stuff happened yo!

Edited January 19, 2014 by Rhyunix

Those titles are automatically assigned based on post count. I'm not sure the exact numbers of posts advances to a new rank, though. I can't actually recall seeing any rank automatically assigned beyond Sr. Spacecraft Engineer, actually. However, users can also assign custom titles, as both myself and Rhyunix here have.
maybe the custom titles is what threw me off then.
